list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a vehicle) collide violently with an obstacle or another vehicle.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the stolen car she was riding in crashed into a tree
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: chiếc xe bị đánh cắp mà cô đang cưỡi đâm vào một cái cây

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move or cause to move with force, speed, and sudden loud noise.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: huge waves crashed down on us
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những con sóng lớn rơi xuống chúng ta

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a business, a market, or a price) fall suddenly and disastrously in value.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Giá bạc bị rơi vào đầu những năm 1980

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a machine, system, or software) fail suddenly.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the project was postponed because the computer crashed
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Dự án đã bị hoãn vì máy tính bị sập

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: enter (a party) without an invitation or permission.
go to sleep, especially suddenly or in an improvised setting.
a violent collision, typically of one vehicle with another or with an obstacle.
a sudden loud noise as of something breaking or hitting another object.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he slammed the phone down with a crash
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh đập điện thoại xuống với một vụ tai nạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sudden disastrous drop in the value or price of something, especially shares of stock.
a sudden failure which puts a system out of action.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: system crashes are an everyday hazard
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sự cố hệ thống là một mối nguy hiểm hàng ngày

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a coarse plain linen, woolen, or cotton fabric, used for curtains and towels.
done rapidly or urgently and involving a concentrated effort.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một khóa học sụp đổ trong tiếng Ý
